mapper.select: select rcrt_no, course_div, course_name, nth_code, ent_year, term_div, step_div, sel_cnt, status_div from entry_sel_master

select c.aply_no, c.doc_pass_yn, d.ev_pdf_file_no, d.note, e.ev1_score, e.ev2_score, e.ev3_score from entry_apply_master as c inner join entry_ev_target as d on c.aply_no = d.aply_no and c.rcrt_no = d.rcrt_no inner join sel_ev_score as e on e.aply_no = d.aply_no and e.rcrt_no = d.rcrt_no where c.rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo}
